# MPEGLayer1

**Enumeration Case**

The MPEG-1/2, Layer 1 audio format.

## Declaration

```swift
MPEGLayer1
```

## Discussion

This format uses no flags.

## Other MPEG Formats

- **MPEGLayer2**: The MPEG-1/2, Layer 2 audio format.
- **MPEGLayer3**: The MPEG-1/2, Layer 3 audio format.
- **MPEGD_USAC**: The MPEG-D Unified Speech and Audio Coding format.
